long_description: The Anon Blitz snow helmet offers a classic design with a brim and extra-warm, expedition fleece lining. Active Climate Control allows you to control ventilation with one hand. Active Climate Control allows one-handed, fine-tuned climate control; keep open for maximum airflow, closed to keep warmth in, or choose anywhere in between. Low-pile, pill-resistant expedition fleece lining maximizes warmth and moisture-wicking properties during high-heat riding and hiking. Simple Fit allows riders to rock a beanie underneath their lid by simply removing the ear pads and inner liner for a skate-inspired, low-profile fit and feel. Endura-Shell construction features an injection-molded ABS exterior for long-lasting durability and ding-resistant strength. Goggles ventilation channels help keep goggles from fogging. Removable goggles clip on the back of the Anon Blitz helmet secures goggles strap. Anon helmets are optimized for use with Anon goggles, offering an airtight, seamless connection between helmet and goggles (goggles not included). Compatible with Anon ASFX helmet audio system (sold separately) for flawless audio integration on the mountain. This snow helmet complies with ASTM F 2040 and/or CE EN 1077B alpine ski and snowboard helmet safety standards.
